        public java.util.Optional<DistanceInfo> findDistanceInfo(java.lang.String startLat,
                                                         java.lang.String startLng,
                                                         java.lang.String endLat,
                                                         java.lang.String endLng)
                                                  throws ReceiverException
        Method find distance info : distance and duration
        Parameters:
        startLat - start latitude
        startLng - start longitude
        endLat - end latitude
        endLng - end longitude
        Throws:
        ReceiverException - throws when there are problems decode distance with Google API
        See Also:
        HttpClient,GetMethod,JSONObject,JSONValidator
